message.body:
Me too. This jerkwad!
...I don't mean that.
Now when is coming? Is he still coming?
I have no idea. He's not answering me.
He's no coming. He could've made it but he said he was just going to stay home. Pissed.

I know. I'm so angry. If he went to the bus station when I told him to, they would've let him on if there was room and he would've been here around 3. But noooooo, he said he's going to use this is effing motivation to get work done at home. I can't.
I think he purposely missed it
Aw why would he do that? I mean he could still come. He's being stupid lol

He said he's staying home. But it's because I literally called him about 3 times and sent him countless of texts. He has never slept through that much and he didn't work last night so there's no reason why he should have slept through his "3 alarms" and everything.
And he wouldn't hear an argument. He just said he had to get his assignments done. My guess is that there was some assignment he forgot about and he purposely didn't come.
Besides, if you know that you're supposed to go somewhere, you generally don't oversleep.
